column4: Hi all.  I just installed Ubuntu and when I login the desktop doesn't finish loading just kind of hangs before I even get the splash screen telling me that gnome is loading.
does this happen every time on reboot ?
well 15 reboots (feels like windows) and only one worked
have you done the obvious things like ran a memcheck for a few hours
yes,  the memory is good.  I think a gnome file is corrupt (load script etc?)
can't be as it has worked - scripts don't corrupt then uncorrupt then corrupt again
- then it almost requires a memory (or hard disk) issue?
did you say you had run memcheck for a few hours ?
under an hour;  perhaps not long enough?
i'm going to run memcheck now.  I'll be back when i'm done :-)  Any other pointers before I go?
make sure its run through at least 3 full passes
good call, good to remove the obvious
